nodes.text: A droid mechanic owned an apartment on Level 3204 of the city-planet Coruscant during the reign of the Galactic Empire. The apartment was located next door to another apartment owned by the Milon family, which consisted of the children, Anandra Milon and Santigo Milon, and their parents. After the destruction of the planet Alderaan, the mechanic came out of the apartment to speak to Anandra, before slipping back inside.
The apartment was first mentioned in "One Thousand Levels Down", a short story written by Alexander Freed and published in Star Wars Insider 151 in 2014.
